abstract: While Eric Schmidt is giving up the chief executive post, he will remain Google’s point person on deals — but the search giant has had some merger troubles recently.
snippet: While Eric Schmidt is giving up the chief executive post, he will remain Google’s point person on deals — but the search giant has had some merger troubles recently.
lead_paragraph: Paul Sakuma/Associated PressEric E. Schmidt, Google’s chief executive, will become executive chairman.

headline.main: Google’s Management Shift: What Now for M.&A.?

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
